author: Reuters Editorial
title: United States Steel Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.10
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - United States Steel Corp:
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.10 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.29 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FULL-YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA WILL BE APPROXIMATELY $1.7 - $1.8 BILLION
* QTRLY NET SALES $3,149 MILLION VERSUS $2,725 MILLION LAST YEAR
* SEES Q2 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA APPROXIMATELY $400 MILLION * UNITED STATES STEEL - OPERATIONAL CHALLENGES AT STEELMAKING FACILITY AT GREAT LAKES THAT WILL HAVE UNFAVORABLE EBITDA IMPACT OF ABOUT $30 MILLION ON Q2
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $3.15 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
